title: Collaborative Learning Project for Enhancing Argumentative Writing Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic writing structures and foundational logical reasoning skills
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based collaborative tools with step-by-step scaffolding support.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically structure claim-evidence-counterargument frameworks for writing argumentative essays.
Learners can revise and improve their arguments through peer feedback in collaborative discussions.
Learners can enhance their critical thinking levels by utilizing idea-centered and argument-oriented scaffolding.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
